bibl.note: Egypt Exploration Society. Petition to Aurelios Ammonios alias Apollonios, strategus of the Oxyrhynchite nome, preceded by the strategus' letter forwarding it to the property registrars. After 22 May A.D. 241 [= P. Oxy. XLVII, 3365].
